attributes.action: Remove Britain First from the internet and prevent any more britain first pages
attributes.additional_details:
link to main facebook page https://www.facebook.com/OfficialBritainFirst/?fref=ts

a quick search regarding britian first will show several posts about what they have done
attributes.background: Britain first is obviously not about Britain, posting anti-islamic posts, among the post that have been made there are several images that other groups such as the armed forces has asked to be taken down and have not, along with this at 11:00am on 11/11/2015 they posted a stereotype British post

rejection.details:
The UK Government can't act to remove pages from the internet. If you are concerned about Britain First, you could consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106833
